roleList.admin: Overall application admin. Can perform admin activities and also encompasses all other roles
roleList.reviewer: Can only review contents assigned to them through authoring tool
roleList.publisher: Can only publish contents assigned to them through authoring tool
roleList.platform-feedback-admin: Can see and respond to feedback given at Wingspan platform level
roleList.editor: Can edit, review and publish all contents - including those created by others
roleList.content-creator: Can create content - resources, modules, courses, programs through authoring tool
roleList.register-admin: Can take care of registration workflow for content sources that require registration (ex: Skillsoft, Pluralsight, etc.)
roleList.content-feedback-admin: Can see and respond to feedback given at Wingspan content level
roleList.analytics: Can access learning analytics section of Wingspan
